article_title: Aaron Harber interviews Metro State Political Science Professor Sheila Rucki – The Denver Post
article_text: An uproar over the never-ending roar of traffic on C-470 could put the start this summer of a long-planned expansion of the heavily used highway through Denver’s southern suburbs in jeopardy.

og.description: Watch: Aaron Harber interviews Metro State Political Science Professor Sheila Rucki
